FuncDef:
The flowspec match-ip-layer mpls-pop command configures IP-information-based BGP flow specification for outgoing packets on the public network.
The undo flowspec match-ip-layer mpls-pop command configures IP-information-based BGP flow specification for packets forwarded out of the public network.
By default, IP-information-based BGP flow specification is configured for outgoing packets on the public network.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To configure IP-information-based BGP flow specification for outgoing packets on the public network, run the flowspec match-ip-layer mpls-pop command.
Precautions
This command is not supported on the LPUF-50/LPUF-50-L/LPUI-21-L/LPUI-51-L/LPUF-51/LPUF-51-B/LPUI-51/LPUI-51-B/LPUS-51/LPUF-101/LPUF-101-B/LPUI-101/LPUI-101-B/LPUS-101.
